roleset.name: suppose to be, take as
roleset.note: FANCY-V NOTES: No VNcls. Updated by Julia, 12/2010. (from fancy.01-v)

example.name: the one example
example.text: Jeff Bridges is the younger brother, Jack, who-1 [*T*-1] fancies himself the rebellious artist; he lives in a loft with his sick dog and the occasional visit from the little girl upstairs, who climbs down the fire escape.

roleset.name: want, like
roleset.note: FANCY-V NOTES: Member of VNcls want-32.1, admire-31.2. (from fancy.02-v)
FANCY-N NOTES: Based on verb entry fancy.02. Corresponds to VNcls want-32.1, admire-31.2. (from fancy.01-n)

example.name: hungry boy
example.text: ``Right now,'' John said, ``I'd fancy a hot fudge sundae.''

example.name: within LVC, all arguments
example.text: Many enterprises have successively taken a fancy for this " Golden Waterway " and are now actively investing in building factories .

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Val indulges her fancy for dressing up.
